meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to stand (up); to rise; to get to one's feet; to stand on end (e.g. of hairs); to stick up 次々に立って出ていった。One after another they stood up and went out.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to stand (in a position; of a person, tree, building, etc.); to be situated (in, on) 断崖のてっぺんに古い城が立っている。An old castle stands on top of the cliff.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to be (in difficulties, the lead, etc.); to put oneself (in a position or situation); to take up (a position, post, etc.); to position oneself その大臣は不正取引によって窮地に立ちました。The minister was in a fix over illegal dealings.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to leave (to do something) 失礼しますといって席を立った。I excused myself from the table.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to depart (on a journey, trip, etc.); to leave; to set off; to start oft. written as 発つあの人はアメリカへ立ったまま消息がない。Nothing has been heard from him since he left for America.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to get stuck (into; of an arrow, thorn etc.); to pierce

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to develop (of a haze, waves, etc.); to form (of steam, bubbles, etc.); to appear (of a rainbow, clouds, etc.); to rise (of smoke, waves, etc.); to begin to blow (of a wind, breeze, etc.) 煙突から煙が立っていた。Smoke was rising from the chimney.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to spread (of a rumour, reputation, etc.); to be become widely known その過激派が政府打倒の陰謀を企てているという噂が立ってる。There is a rumor that the radicals are plotting against the government.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to stand (for election); to run 彼は今度の選挙には立たないだろう。He is not running in the coming election.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to take action; to act; to rise (up); to rouse oneself also written as 起つ彼らは圧制に反抗して立った。They rose against oppression.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 11. to be established (of a policy, plan, objective, etc.); to be formed 彼らのチームは今シーズンほとんど勝算が立たない。Their team doesn't have a ghost of a chance of winning this season.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 12. to be valid (of an argument, logic, etc.); to hold up; to hold water; to stand up (e.g. of evidence); to be logical; to be reasonable

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 13. to be sustained (of a living, business, etc.); to be maintained; to survive; to be preserved (of one's reputation, honour, etc.); to be saved

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 14. to start (of a season); to begin

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 15. to be held (of a market) 市は月曜ごとに立つ。The market is held every Monday.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 16. to shut (of a door, shoji, etc.); to be shut; to be closed

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 17. to be (the result of a division)

sentences.translation: One after another they stood up and went out.
An old castle stands on top of the cliff.
The minister was in a fix over illegal dealings.
I excused myself from the table.
Nothing has been heard from him since he left for America.
Smoke was rising from the chimney.
There is a rumor that the radicals are plotting against the government.
He is not running in the coming election.
They rose against oppression.
Their team doesn't have a ghost of a chance of winning this season.
The market is held every Monday.

meanings.meaning: 1. splendid; fine; handsome; elegant; imposing; prominent; impressive
2. praiseworthy; creditable; worthy
3. legal; legitimate; lawful
4. undeniable (e.g. crime); indisputable; solid
1. splendid; fine; handsome; elegant; imposing; prominent; impressive
2. praiseworthy; creditable; worthy
3. legal; legitimate; lawful
4. undeniable (e.g. crime); indisputable; solid
1. to stand up; to put up; to set up; to erect; to raise also written as 起てるバースデーケーキにろうそくを立ててください。Please put some candles on the birthday cake.
2. to thrust into; to bury into; to dig into 猫が私の手につめを立てた。The cat dug its claws into my hand.
3. to make (a noise); to start (a rumour); to raise (a cloud of dust, etc.); to cause 彼は怒るとよく大声をたてる。He is liable to shout when angry.
4. to make; to establish; to set up; to develop; to formulate 彼は綿密に立てた計画を実行に移した。He carried out the plan he had made in detail.
5. to put up (a political candidate); to make (one's leader) 我々は彼を彼らと交渉する代表にたてた。We delegated him to negotiate with them.
6. to treat with respect; to give (someone) their due; to make (someone) look good; to avoid embarrassing (someone) 私は彼に義理を立てなければならない。I have to do right by him.
7. to sharpen; to make clear
8. to shut; to close See also 閉てる
9. to make tea (matcha); to perform the tea ceremony See also 点てる
10. to divide by
11. to do ... vigorously after the -masu stem of a verb
1. to stand up; to put up; to set up; to erect; to raise also written as 起てるバースデーケーキにろうそくを立ててください。Please put some candles on the birthday cake.
2. to thrust into; to bury into; to dig into 猫が私の手につめを立てた。The cat dug its claws into my hand.
3. to make (a noise); to start (a rumour); to raise (a cloud of dust, etc.); to cause 彼は怒るとよく大声をたてる。He is liable to shout when angry.
4. to make; to establish; to set up; to develop; to formulate 彼は綿密に立てた計画を実行に移した。He carried out the plan he had made in detail.
5. to put up (a political candidate); to make (one's leader) 我々は彼を彼らと交渉する代表にたてた。We delegated him to negotiate with them.
6. to treat with respect; to give (someone) their due; to make (someone) look good; to avoid embarrassing (someone) 私は彼に義理を立てなければならない。I have to do right by him.
7. to sharpen; to make clear
8. to shut; to close See also 閉てる
9. to make tea (matcha); to perform the tea ceremony See also 点てる
10. to divide by
11. to do ... vigorously after the -masu stem of a verb

sentences.translation: Please put some candles on the birthday cake.
The cat dug its claws into my hand.
He is liable to shout when angry.
He carried out the plan he had made in detail.
We delegated him to negotiate with them.
I have to do right by him.

meanings.meaning: 1. position; situation お答えできる立場にありません。I'm not in a position to answer.
2. viewpoint; standpoint; point of view 彼女の立場からその問題をとらえるようにしなさい。Try to see the problem from her point of view.
1. position; situation お答えできる立場にありません。I'm not in a position to answer.
2. viewpoint; standpoint; point of view 彼女の立場からその問題をとらえるようにしなさい。Try to see the problem from her point of view.

sentences.translation: I'm not in a position to answer.
Try to see the problem from her point of view.

1. face; official stance; public position or attitude (as opposed to private thoughts) See also 本音少数民族の雇用促進政策とはいっても、建前にすぎず、現状はマイノリティーが職に就けるチャンスなどほとんどない。Although many pay lip service to the idea of affirmative action, in reality, very few minorities get hired.
2. ceremony for the erection of the framework of a house Only applies to 建前, Only applies to 建て前
建て前 【たてまえ】、立前 【たてまえ】、立て前 【たてまえ】

sentences.translation: Although many pay lip service to the idea of affirmative action, in reality, very few minorities get hired.

meanings.meaning: 1. assize; court

3. Legislature A legislature is a kind of deliberative assembly with the... Read more

sentences.translation: It has been shown in most studies on this subject that intervention of the legislature had adverse effects.

meanings.type: Noun, Suru verb, Transitive verb, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. planning; devising (a plan)

meanings.type: Noun, Suru verb, Transitive verb, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. drafting; drawing up
1. going out (before burning completely); dying out
2. fizzling out (e.g. of a plan); falling through; coming to nothing; dying away (e.g. of a rumour)
立消え 【たちぎえ】
1. being brought to a standstill; being stranded; getting stuck; stalling; deadlock 私は病院へ行く途中、交通渋滞にあって立ち往生してしまった。I was held up on my way to the hospital in a traffic jam.
2. being stumped; being in a dilemma; stopping in one's tracks; standing speechless フランス語の先生は生徒の質問に立ち往生した。The French teacher was stumped by her student's question.
3. dying while standing (and remaining standing); dying on one's feet
立往生 【たちおうじょう】

sentences.translation: I was held up on my way to the hospital in a traffic jam.
The French teacher was stumped by her student's question.

1. independence; self-reliance; supporting oneself; being on one's own 彼女は両親から独立している。She is independent of her parents.
2. independence (e.g. of a nation); freedom インドは英国から１９４７年に独立した。India gained independence from Britain in 1947.
3. separation; isolation 頑固になればなるほど独立するよ。The more stubborn you are, the more isolated you become.
4. Independence Independence is a condition of a nation, country, or stat... Read more

sentences.translation: She is independent of her parents.
India gained independence from Britain in 1947.
The more stubborn you are, the more isolated you become.
